author: Don C

review: The set up was more difficult that I had anticipated.  I tried to set it up using my desktop computer which is right next to the TV.  That never did work.  However, when I moved to my tablet, it went more smoothly.  We are now streaming with no difficulty; no buffering, very good quality HD picture.  Very happy.  I just wish I could get another one for my studio, where I have an old analog TV.  It may be worth buying a new TV for that room.
author: SandyC

review: Works great. Easy to set up and is small and easily hidden. No streaming delays to speak of, and is perfect for watching anything from your computer.
author: Julius

review: If you have a semi old TV and want to watch netflix, redbox, hulu and what not, then Chromecast will definitely put a smile on your fave. I have a 37 inch Panasonic flat screen and didn't want to have it hooked up to PS or DVD players to get access to online streamers like netflix. Chromecast works nice and it is so easy to setup. I've been watching mainly netflix on my old TV now. For what it does you can not beat that price either. So overall I am happy with the device and the price.
author: Touraj Behmand "Touraj Behmand"

review: not a real necessity if you have a blue ray player with internet capability. The particular blue ray ray feature will play u-tube and a lot of other videos from almost any site and view other internet pages. more expeditiously and with more versitilitiy than chromecast.  However chrome cast is easy to use and install but it requires you to have to go back to your computer to change the utube video you are watching. very inconvinient if your pc is upstairs or a few rooms away. If you don't have bluray chrome cast is a very economical wat to go.
